Uses of Screen in gameutils
 

Classes in gameutils that implement Screen
 class BasicScreen
          Takes care of most abstract methods.
 class MenuPage
          A MenuPage is a Screen that holds and organizes a set of Widgets.
 class Menus
          Menus organizes a group of MenuPages.
 

Methods in gameutils that return Screen
 Screen Game.getScreen()
          Returns the current screen.
 Screen Game.getScreen(String name)
          Returns the screen specified
